mapper.sql: SELECT AUTH.AUTH_SEQ AS authSeq , AUTH.AUTH_CD AS authCd , AUTH.AUTH_NM AS authNm , CASE WHEN LOGIN.AUTH_SEQ = 1 OR LOGIN.USER_SEQ = AUTH.REG_SEQ THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ownerYn , AUTH.USE_YN AS useYn , DATE_FORMAT(AUTH.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , FN_GET_USER_NM(AUTH.REG_SEQ) AS regNm , DATE_FORMAT(AUTH.UPT_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS uptDt , FN_GET_USER_NM(AUTH.UPT_SEQ) AS uptNm FROM TB_AUTH AUTH LEFT JOIN TB_USER LOGIN ON LOGIN.USER_SEQ = #{loginUserSeq} WHERE (CASE WHEN LOGIN.AUTH_SEQ = 1 THEN TRUE ELSE AUTH.USE_YN = 'Y' END)
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_AUTH AUTH LEFT JOIN TB_USER LOGIN ON LOGIN.USER_SEQ = #{loginUserSeq} WHERE (CASE WHEN LOGIN.AUTH_SEQ = 1 THEN TRUE ELSE AUTH.USE_YN = 'Y' END)
AND AUTH.AUTH_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR AUTH.AUTH_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
SELECT AUTH.AUTH_SEQ AS authSeq , AUTH.AUTH_CD AS authCd , AUTH.AUTH_NM AS authNm FROM TB_AUTH AUTH WHERE AUTH.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AUTH.AUTH_CD = #{authCd}
mapper.sql: SELECT AM.AUTH_MENU_SEQ AS authMenuSeq , AUTH.AUTH_SEQ AS authSeq , MENU.MENU_SEQ AS menuSeq , MENU.MENU_NM AS menuNm , MENU.MENU_DESC AS menuDesc , MENU.PAGE_URL AS pageUrl , MENU.PAGE_TARGET AS pageTarget , AM.READ_YN AS readYn , AM.WRITE_YN AS writeYn , AM.EXEC_YN AS execYn , AM.USE_YN AS useYn FROM TB_AUTH AUTH INNER JOIN TB_AUTH_MENU AM ON AUTH.AUTH_SEQ = AM.AUTH_SEQ INNER JOIN TB_MENU MENU ON MENU.MENU_SEQ = AM.MENU_SEQ WHERE AUTH.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MENU.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AUTH.AUTH_SEQ = #{authSeq}
